=== Common Agreements ===

* Future monthly meetings will have the following format:
### First is a 10 mins overview of Ubuntu for newbies
### Second is a How to Session on an Ubuntu related topic
### Three is Tea, Coffee and Snacks for a social end to the night.
* Rotating speakers for the How to Sessions
* Not to splinter Ubuntu-ae into smaller areas (Dubai, Abu Dhabi etc.)
